GapFillDragDrop.Title: as ... as and describing quantity
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the words and drag them to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1. The majority of our members – almost 85% – are from Eastern Europe.
2. With the aid of technology we worked out that the process takes precisely 0.887512 seconds.
3. Marjorie went to a great deal of trouble to make us feel at home.
4. The house's windows were broken and the walls had caved in; the place was virtually destroyed.
5. Some of those rooms cost well over 1,000 a night; the best ones are more like 3,000.
6. We need to conserve as much energy as possible.
7. Most of the committee agreed to the new proposal, but a small minority voted against it.
8. No one knows the exact figure but we have estimated that it is approximately 18.5.
9. You can rent a maximum of ten movies a week if you subscribe to NetFilms.
10. It's said that there used to be as many as a hundred different dialects in Papua New Guinea.
